Use a Package as if a Module

Source: R/utils.R
as_module.Rd

Use a Package as if a Module

as_module(package)

Arguments

package

name of a package; character

Value

a module that contains a package's exported objects

Examples


tcltk <- as_module("tcltk")
ls(tcltk)
#>   [1] "addTclPath"             "as.tclObj"              "getTkProgressBar"      
#>   [4] "is.tclObj"              "is.tkwin"               "setTkProgressBar"

#> [1] FALSE
